amendment.description: Amendment adds to the list of predicates used for obtaining electronic surveillance, certain crimes which are related to terrorism.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in part B of House Report 109-178 to add to the list of offense that are predicates for obtaining electronic surveillance (i.e. a wiretap) to include offenses which relate to terrorism.

action.text: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Lungren, Daniel E..

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lungren, Daniel E. amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
